item.title: Getting started with Rhombus Open Marketplace
item.description: Requirements There are couple of things needed before you can access the Rhombus Open Marketplace: Rhombus Desktop client installed & working functional (default) wallet within Rhombus Desktop RHOM coins for buying/selling (get some on available exchanges) Make sure you have a Rhombus Desktop installed with a working wallet before continuing. Create Market-enabled wallet To enable the Open Marketplace, you need to create a second wallet and name it Market.
